```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE,
                      message=FALSE,
                      warning=FALSE)

library(quantmod) ## includes zoo (which includes xts)
library(PerformanceAnalytics)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(scales)
```

## Get Bitcoin data

* Cdn dollar value

```{r}
btc <- getSymbols(Symbols="BTC-CAD", auto.assign=FALSE)
summary(btc)
```

### Take a look

```{r}
## basic chart_Series from quantmod
chart_Series(Cl(btc))
```

```{r}
btc45d <- tail(btc, n=45)
summary(btc45d[,1:4])
chart_Series(btc45d)
```


## Get Ethereum data

```{r}
eth <- getSymbols(Symbols="ETH-CAD", auto.assign=FALSE)
summary(eth)
```

### Take a look

```{r}
## basic chart_Series from quantmod
chart_Series(Cl(eth))
```

### Zoom in recent periods

* 90d

```{r}
eth90d <- tail(eth, n=90)
summary(eth90d[,1:4])
```

```{r}
chart_Series(eth90d)
```

* 45d

```{r}
eth45d <- tail(eth, n=45)
summary(eth45d[,1:4])
chart_Series(eth45d)
```


## Correlation: BTC, ETH

* since beginning 2017

```{r}
kryptos <- merge(btc, eth, join='outer', fill=NA)
kryptos2017 <- kryptos['2017-01-01/'] 
```

```{r}
chart_Series(kryptos[,c(4,8)])
```

```{r}
chart.Correlation(kryptos[,c(4,8)], histogram=TRUE)
```
